name: dice-kind
description: A demo Kind contract for dice written in AssemblyScript

scripts.register:kind: every kind register $(every matter pick build/index.wasm elements/data.json) '[1]' '[]' --json register/kind.json --no-quiet
scripts.hash:matter: every matter hash build/index.wasm elements/data.json --json register/hashes.json
scripts.register:matter: every matter register build/index.wasm elements/data.json --json register/matter.json --no-quiet
